messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster?
ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster is used for editing images with HTML templates to create customized images, such as game cards, posters, and commercial ads.
Can you provide an example of a demo file for ComfyUI Workflow using ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster?
Yes, the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file used with ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster is available at [workflow-lcm-poster.json](workflow-lcm-poster.json).
Which style plugin is used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file?
The style plugin used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file is [ComfyUI_Mexx_Styler](https://github.com/SoftMeng/ComfyUI_Mexx_Styler).
What is the LCM model used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file?
The LCM model used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file is [mexxldimsdxllcm2](https://civitai.com/models/217692/mexxldimsdxllcm2).
What should be done if the LCM model is not used?
If the LCM model is not used, then the sampler and the number of steps for the sampler need to be adjusted.
Are there any examples of generated images using ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster?

Yes, the generated images using ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster are available at [00155.jpg](demo%2F00155.jpg), [00151.jpg](demo%2F00151.jpg), [00156.jpg](demo%2F00156.jpg), [00152.jpg](demo%2F00152.jpg), [00153.jpg](demo%2F00153.jpg), and [00154.jpg](demo%2F00154.jpg).
